description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

FilterName.description: The name of the filter generated by resource.
FilterName.markdownDescription:
The name of the filter generated by resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

DestinationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination.
DestinationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

FilterPattern.description: The filtering expressions that restrict what gets delivered to the destination AWS resource.
FilterPattern.markdownDescription:
The filtering expressions that restrict what gets delivered to the destination AWS resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

LogGroupName.description: Existing log group that you want to associate with this filter.
LogGroupName.markdownDescription:
Existing log group that you want to associate with this filter.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

RoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that grants CloudWatch Logs permissions to deliver ingested log events to the destination stream. You don't need to provide the ARN when you are working with a logical destination for cross-account delivery.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an IAM role that grants CloudWatch Logs permissions to deliver ingested log events to the destination stream. You don't need to provide the ARN when you are working with a logical destination for cross-account delivery.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Distribution.description: The method used to distribute log data to the destination. By default, log data is grouped by log stream, but the grouping can be set to random for a more even distribution. This property is only applicable when the destination is an Amazon Kinesis stream.
Distribution.markdownDescription:
The method used to distribute log data to the destination. By default, log data is grouped by log stream, but the grouping can be set to random for a more even distribution. This property is only applicable when the destination is an Amazon Kinesis stream.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Random | ByLogStream  
Update requires: Replacement
